item.title: SOFI
item.description: score:-12 Chances: The fintech company SoFi Technologies, Inc. operates through three segments: lending, financial services, and a technology platform, showing a diversified revenue stream. SoFi Technologies is shifting away from its lending business to make room for other revenue sources, a smart move to diversify its business operations.
